SELECT RES.* , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', PHONE, '') USERPHONENUMBER , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', EMAIL, '') USEREMAIL FROM (
SELECT /* com.ceragem.crm.backcus.dao.CrmUserInfoBaseDao.selectList */
FROM ONLYDB.USERS
AND USERNAME = #{userName}
AND DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',PHONE,'') LIKE '%${userPhoneNumber}%'
AND EMAIL = DAMO.ENCRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',#{userEmail} || '@' || #{domain},'')
ORDER BY USERNAME, CREATED_AT
) RES

SELECT RES.* , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', PHONE, '') USERPHONENUMBER , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', EMAIL, '') USEREMAIL FROM (
SELECT /* com.ceragem.crm.backcus.dao.CrmUserInfoBaseDao.selectList */ * FROM ( SELECT USERNAME AS "USERNAME" /*사용자명 */ , LOGIN_ID AS "LOGINID" /*사용자 아이디 */ , PHONE /*전화번호 */ , DECODE(GENDER, 'F', '여', 'M', '남') AS "USERGENDER" , BIRTH AS "USERBIRTH" /*생년월일 */ , EMAIL /*사용자이메일 */ , CREATED_AT FROM ONLYDB.CRM_MSHIP_JOIN )
AND USERNAME = #{userName}
AND DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', PHONE, '') LIKE '%${userPhoneNumber}%'
AND EMAIL = DAMO.ENCRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',#{userEmail} || '@' || #{domain},'')
ORDER BY USERNAME, CREATED_AT
) RES

SELECT RES.* , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',P_PHONE, '')||DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',N_PHONE, '')||DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',PHONE, '') ASPHONE , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',P_MOBILE, '')||DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',N_MOBILE, '')||DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',MOBILE, '') ASMOBILE , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',EMAIL, '') ASEMAIL FROM (
SELECT /* com.ceragem.crm.backcus.dao.CrmUserInfoBaseDao.asSelectList */ A.AS_CASE_ID /* AS CASE ID */ , A.CUSTOMER_ID /* 고객 ID */ , B.CUSTOMER_NAME /* 고객명 */ , B.P_PHONE , B.N_PHONE , B.PHONE /* 전화번호 */ , B.P_MOBILE , B.N_MOBILE , B.MOBILE /* 휴대전화번호 */ , B.ZIPCODE ASZIPCODE /* 우편번호 */ , B.ADDRESS ASADDRESS /* 주소 */ , B.EMAIL /* 이메일 */ FROM ONLYDB.AS_CASE A , ONLYDB.AS_CUSTOMER B WHERE A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID
AND B.CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND (DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',P_PHONE, '')||DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',N_PHONE, '')||DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',PHONE, '') LIKE '%${userPhoneNumber}%' OR DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',P_MOBILE, '')||DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',N_MOBILE, '')||DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',MOBILE, '') LIKE '%${userPhoneNumber}%')
AND B.EMAIL = DAMO.ENCRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',#{userEmail} || '@' || #{domain},'')
ORDER BY B.CUSTOMER_NAME
) RES

AND EMAIL = DAMO.ENCRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',#{userEmail} || '@' || #{domain},'')
) RES
